data.title: Laker Andrew Bynum to appear with NBA trophy at Torrance bank
data.meta_description: Los Angeles Lakers center Andrew Bynum and the National Basketball Association trophy will visit Torrance’s Comerica Bank building Friday afternoon. The event is part of a three-city trophy tour of Southern California organized by the bank, a long-time Lakers sponsor. The Tiffany & Co.-manufactured silver and gold trophy, officially called the Larry O’Brien NBA Championship […]
data.text:
Los Angeles Lakers center Andrew Bynum and the National Basketball Association trophy will visit Torrance’s Comerica Bank building Friday afternoon.

The event is part of a three-city trophy tour of Southern California organized by the bank, a long-time Lakers sponsor.

The Tiffany & Co.-manufactured silver and gold trophy, officially called the Larry O’Brien NBA Championship Trophy after a former league commissioner, stands more than 2 feet tall and weighs almost 15 pounds.

Bynum, in case you’re wondering, is 7 feet tall and 285 pounds.

Bynum, the trophy and the Laker Girls will appear beginning at 2:30 p.m. at the bank building, 21535 Hawthorne Blvd.

– Nick Green
